title: copy_to_archive_adapter Lambda Config
description: The config for the copy_to_archive_adapter Lambda.

excludedFileExtensions.description: A list of file extensions to ignore when copying files.

s3MultipartChunksizeMb.description: The collection's maximum size of chunks to use when copying. Defaults to environment variable.

defaultBucketOverride.description: Overrides the default bucket to copy to in os.environ['ORCA_DEFAULT_BUCKET'].

defaultStorageClassOverride.description: The class of storage to use when ingesting files. Can be overridden by collection config. Must match value in storage_class table.
